original_text: Very early the next morning, all the Jewish leaders met together. The leaders of the priests met with the leaders, the teachers of God's Law, and the other important Jews. They decided what they would do. They tied Jesus' hands and feet and they took him to Pilate's house. They put him under Pilate's authority.
korean_text: 새벽에 대제사장들이 즉시 장로들과 서기관들 곧 온 공회와 더불어 의논하고 예수를 결박하여 끌고 가서 빌라도에게 넘겨 주니

sentences.original_text: all the Jewish leaders met together
The leaders of the priests met with the leaders
They decided what they would do
They tied Jesus' hands and feet
and they took him to Pilate's house
They put him under Pilate's authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그를 빌라도의 권위 아래 두었다
